error.otros_datos: SELECT TOP 200 T1.PURCHREQTYPE,T1.ORIGINATOR,T1.RECID, T1.PURCHREQID, PURCHREQNAME, T1.REQUIREDDATE, T1.ORIGINATOR, T1.REQUISITIONSTATUS, SUM(T2.LINEAMOUNT) AS TOTAL FROM [Warehouse].[PURCHREQTABLE] T1 INNER JOIN [Warehouse].[PURCHREQLINE] T2 ON T1.RECID = T2.PURCHREQTABLE where T2.INVENTDIMIDDATAAREA = 'LOG' and T2.LINEAMOUNT >0 GROUP BY T1.PURCHREQTYPE,T1.ORIGINATOR,T1.RECID, T1.PURCHREQID, PURCHREQNAME, T1.REQUIREDDATE, T1.ORIGINATOR, T1.REQUISITIONSTATUS order by REQUIREDDATE desc order by fechacreado desc
